text.div:
Human Papilloma Virus Tests

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    11083-3 Human papilloma virus identified in Cervix
    12223-4 Human papilloma virus 16+18 Ag [Presence] in Genital specimen
    14503-7 Human papilloma virus 16+18 Ag [Presence] in Cervix
    14504-5 Human papilloma virus 16+18 Ag [Presence] in Vaginal fluid
    14506-0 Human papilloma virus 16+18 Ag [Presence] in Urethra
    17400-3 Human papilloma virus 16+18 Ag [Presence] in Unspecified specimen
    21440-3 Human papilloma virus 16+18+31+33+35+45+51+52+56 DNA [Presence] in Cervix by DNA probe
    30167-1 Human papilloma virus 16+18+31+33+35+39+45+51+52+56+58+59+68 DNA [Presence] in Cervix by Probe and signal amplification method
    38372-9 Human papilloma virus 6+11+16+18+31+33+35+39+42+43+44+45+51+52+56+58+59+68 DNA [Presence] in Cervix by Probe and signal amplification method
    44550-2 Human papilloma virus DNA [Presence] in Cervix by DNA probe
    49896-4 Human papilloma virus 16+18+31+33+35+39+45+51+52+56+58+59+68 DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Probe and target amplification method
    59420-0 Human papilloma virus 16+18+31+33+35+39+45+51+52+56+58+59+66+68 DNA [Presence] in Cervix by Probe and signal amplification method
    6514-4 Human papilloma virus rRNA [Presence] in Genital specimen by Probe and target amplification method
    6516-9 Human papilloma virus rRNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Probe and target amplification method
    69002-4 Human papilloma virus E6+E7 mRNA [Presence] in Cervix by Probe and target amplification method
    73959-9 Human papilloma virus 16+18+31+33+35+39+45+51+52+56+58+66 DNA [Presence] in Tissue by DNA probe
